message.body: You still feelin lousy?
Feeling muuuuch better. I've been doing laundry all day it sucks
How about you
Oh good! Ugh this period is a doozey! Feelin so heavy and tired!
Just wanna eat a cheeseburger in bed!
Lol. Hahaha. Do it! I'm gonna eat a veggie burger in bed later
Ugh I wish! I'm going to this bbq with Julian at his work
Earlier I was doing laundry and needed to wash my pajamas so I stripped and haven't put any clothes back on. It's a nudist colony over here!
No roommates!
Just eat so any snacks at the BBQ
I feel ya. I was naked until about 3pm.
It feels right'
Didn't want anything touching me.
I feel ya. I was naked until about 3pm.
Definitely gonna. Also gonna drink so much wine that I won't even know where I am
It's the only way.
Gonna get so inappropriate. Julian might get fired.
#simplyme
You gotta do you. Julian will understand
Just don't touch his boss inappropriatly.
Exactly. Gotta do me...there's no other way.
Ugh no way. I don't want anything or anyone touching me right now...I barely wanna put clothes on for this thing.
Just put on a mumu.
Hunter just got to the co site
Took 8 hours!
Oh good! :)
That's wild! How's he feeling?
He said his legs are cramping like crazy
Oh no :(
Hopefully just resting and stretching will help...
That's what I told him. I think he's feeling good otherwise
That's good. Seems like the ride back won't be quite as intense.
I made some fried green tomatoes if you want to come over and eat some.
With an afternoon cocktail
Oh man that sounds awesome! Jules and I slept really late and just ate breakfast so o think I'll have to take a raincheck! Wish I had gotten this text ea
rlier, but my phone was charging!
I actually was about to text you when I got your text...wanted to see if you wanted some potato salad...jules and I have so much from a bbq we went to la
st night.
How was your sister and her friend?
Oh man! I think I'm gonna pass cause I should eat the stuff in the fridge before leaving town tmw. How was the BBQ?
They got in around 10:30 last night and left for NYC this morning. Her friend is like 40 and talks a lot.
Oh yeah I forgot you're leaving tomorrow! Ok I'll just have to eat so much potato salad over the next few days. Bbq was good...I felt awful, but food was
good. This period has really been a doozy!
What you up to the rest of the day? I'm laying in bed right now...got up for like 45 mins and had to lay back down.
Haha. I did some gardening this morning and now I'm smoking weed and packing for my trip and watching the burning man documentary
For real
Probably gonna take a nap
That sounds perfect actually. When your sister coming back?
They will get in pretty late I think and head back to VA in the Morninf
How were those fried green tomatoes?
So good. I love summer food
I love fried green tomatoes!!
The movie I mean
That kathy bates is a real fire cracker
She's what I imagine myself to be in 30 years
I think I'm heading in that direction #Birkenstocks
That doesn't sound so bad...I actually think she's pretty cool...#kathybatesismyhero
#givemethatfloweytop
